trans-unit.source: Represents a standard Windows vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en standard loddrette rullefeltet for Windows.

trans-unit.source: Most controls that need scroll bars already provide them and do not require this control.
trans-unit.target: De fleste kontrollene som må rulle stolper allerede oppgir og krever ikke denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This is true of a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, for example.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjelder for flere linjer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontroll, en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, og en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, for eksempel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use this control to implement scrolling in containers that do not provide their own scroll bars such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> or for user input of numeric data.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne kontrollen til å implementere rulling i beholdere som ikke har sine egne side-felt som en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>eller brukerinndata med numeriske data.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>

trans-unit.source: The numeric data can be displayed in a control or used in code.
trans-unit.target: Numeriske data som kan vises i en kontroll eller brukes i koden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> properties determine the range of values the user can select.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> property determines the effect of clicking within the scroll bar but outside the scroll box.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>egenskapen bestemmer effekten ved å klikke i rullefeltet, men utenfor boksen rullefeltet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> property determines the effect of clicking the scroll arrows at each end of the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>egenskapen bestemmer effekten ved å klikke rullepilene på slutten av kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppretting av nødvendige parameterne når kontrollen referansen opprettes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> som inneholder de nødvendige oppretting parameterne når håndtaket for kontrollen som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
The default <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> of the control.
Gets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen elementer justeres til støtter nasjonale innstillinger for å bruke høyre-mot-venstre skrifter.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeft property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> control cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RightToLeft for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>kontrollen kan ikke angis.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft*> property changes.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> control cannot be set, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> never raises the RightToLeftChanged event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>kontrollen kan ikke angis, så <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>viser aldri RightToLeftChanged-hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft%2A>
